name: Darkest Shadow
description:
Designers: Tim Chen, Alex Xu, James Liu, Yuyao Wu, Wen Liu
(The game is still a prototype)

Darkest Shadow is a  puzzle game that has its settings in a small town, where some mysterious creatures appeared and are able to disguise themselves as humans and attack humans at night. In order to keep the town safe, residents are ordered to stay at home at night and are provided with supplies by delivery people. 

As the player, you must stay in your home and gather information about the creature through sources such as the radio and newspaper. Each day, someone will knock on your door and you must use the information you have gathered to decide whether or not to open the door for them, as they may be the creature in disguise or a delivery person. In addition to this, you can communicate with the outside world through objects such as the telephone and explore various storylines and endings within the game.
